name: True/False
description: True or false questions with feedback. Perfect for quick knowledge checks and misconception testing.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate an object with a title and an array of statements, each with correctness, explanation, and wrong feedback.

statements.isTrue: boolean - Whether the statement is true or false
statements.explanation: string - Explanation shown when the user answers correctly
statements.wrongFeedback: string - Feedback shown when the user answers incorrectly
statements.image_prompt: string (optional) - Description of an image to illustrate this statement
statements.video_prompt: string (optional) - Description of a short video clip to illustrate this statement
statements.audio_prompt: string (optional) - Text to narrate as audio for this statement

statements.statement: Photosynthesis occurs in the mitochondria of plant cells.
statements.explanation: Photosynthesis occurs in the chloroplasts, not the mitochondria. Mitochondria are responsible for cellular respiration.
statements.wrongFeedback: Think again. Mitochondria are responsible for cellular respiration, not photosynthesis. The correct organelle is the chloroplast.
statements.image_prompt: An educational diagram showing a plant cell with chloroplasts and mitochondria clearly labeled

statements.statement: Plants release oxygen as a byproduct of photosynthesis.
statements.explanation: Correct! Oxygen is released during the light reactions of photosynthesis when water molecules are split.
statements.wrongFeedback: Actually, oxygen IS released during photosynthesis through the splitting of water molecules in the light-dependent reactions.

h5p_params_format.question: Photosynthesis occurs in the mitochondria of plant cells.

behaviour.feedbackOnCorrect: Photosynthesis occurs in the chloroplasts, not the mitochondria.
behaviour.feedbackOnWrong: Think again. Mitochondria are responsible for cellular respiration, not photosynthesis.

confirmCheck.body: Are you sure you wish to finish ?

confirmRetry.body: Are you sure you wish to retry ?

conversion_notes.correct_value: Use string 'true' or 'false' (not boolean) for H5P
conversion_notes.single_statement: H5P.TrueFalse handles one statement. For multiple, use QuestionSet with type: true_false per question
conversion_notes.media_support: Media is only included when image_url is present — no empty placeholder
